simple_bug.text:
## UI bug: Billing badge overlaps avatar on mobile

### Summary
On iPhone 14 and Pixel 8 (Chrome), the "Pro" badge in the top-right nav overlaps the user avatar.

### Steps to reproduce
1. Log in as any paid user
2. Set viewport width to 375px
3. Open dashboard header

### Expected
Badge stays aligned to the right of the user name.

### Actual
Badge renders above avatar and blocks the profile menu tap target.

### Notes
This appears only on narrow breakpoints.

feature_request.text:
## Feature request: Weekly project digest email

### Problem
Team leads want one weekly email with top changes, unresolved blockers, and deployment status per project.

### Requested behavior
- Digest every Monday at 9:00 AM org-local time
- Include links to open incidents and PRs merged last week
- Let admins disable per workspace

### Why now
Support volume is rising and leads miss status in Slack threads.

performance_issue.text:
## Performance: Search page takes 6-9s after latest deploy

### Scope
`/search` endpoint regressed in production right after commit `b7f91f2`.

### Evidence
- Datadog p95 moved from 850ms to 7.2s
- CPU on web pods increased 2.3x
- Slow query logs show repeated `ILIKE '%term%'` scans

### Ask
Please inspect the query code path and suggest likely root cause + remediation plan.

integration_bug.text:
## Integration bug: Stripe subscription active but CRM still marked trial

### Symptoms
Customers complete checkout and Stripe shows `active`, but HubSpot contact property `plan_status` stays `trial`.

### Context
- Webhook `customer.subscription.updated` appears in Stripe dashboard
- Internal event processor logs occasional `429` from CRM API
- Sales team depends on this field for handoff

### Ask
Investigate likely failure points across webhook handler, queue worker, and CRM sync.

docs_gap.text:
## Docs gap: Missing runbook for rotating API keys

### Problem
On-call engineers can rotate provider keys in dashboard, but there is no internal runbook for updating env vars, verifying webhooks, and rollback.

### Impact
Rotation is currently tribal knowledge and delayed one outage response last week.

### Ask
Document the exact operational steps with validation checks.

production_incident.text:
## P1 Incident: Login failures spiking in production

### Current status
- Error rate reached 38% in last 10 minutes
- Users report repeated redirects to `/auth/error`
- Revenue impact expected if unresolved this hour

### Recent changes
Auth middleware was updated 30 minutes ago to enforce stricter session checks.

### Immediate ask
Triage probable cause, propose mitigation, and notify incident admin channel with short status.
